Entry.JapaneseText: 敵一覧
Entry.EnglishText: Monster Book

Entry.JapaneseText: エンカウントエリア情報
Entry.EnglishText: Monster Encounter Areas

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族ヘルプ
Entry.EnglishText: Monster Types

Entry.JapaneseText: 武具潜在能力一覧
Entry.EnglishText: Equipment Skills

Entry.JapaneseText: 戦闘用語辞典
Entry.EnglishText: Battle Glossary

Entry.JapaneseText: 戦闘履歴
Entry.EnglishText: Battle Records

Entry.JapaneseText: 攻撃、防御を臨機応変に行うが、 特殊な能力はそれほど持っていない。 知能が高いため隊列などをうまく使ってくる。
Entry.EnglishText: Agile in attack and defense but lack many special abilities. They have high intelligence for effective use of strategy and formation.
Entry.Notes: Huma type description Lauren will do

Entry.JapaneseText: 環境適応能力が高いため、それぞれが 特殊な能力を持っているが、 反面非常に弱い部分も持っている。
Entry.EnglishText: As a result of their ability to adapt to their environment, they each have their own special abilities, but on the other hand they also have very weak points.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマ、異種族の間に生まれた ヒト。角と尾を有し、生まれつき強い フォルス能力を持つ。非常にまれな存在。
Entry.EnglishText: People born between Huma and Gajuma, different species. They have horns and tails, and have strong Force abilities by birth. Extremely rare individuals.

Entry.JapaneseText: 主に翼を持ち、空を飛んでいる。 空を飛べる利点と素早さを活かし、 こちらの隊列をかく乱させる戦法をとる。
Entry.EnglishText: Mainly winged and flying. Their strategy is use the advantage of being able to fly and their speed to disrupt our formation.

Entry.JapaneseText: 虫がバイラスとなり、巨大化したもの。 もともと硬い身体を持っているため 防御力が非常に高い。
Entry.EnglishText: Beings that were bugs and became Birus of great size. They have hard bodies due to their nature and their defensive power is extremely high.

Entry.JapaneseText: 水中や水辺に住む生物がバイラス化したもの。 大群で襲ってくる事がある。
Entry.EnglishText: Beings that were creatures that lived in or near water and became Biruses. They attack in large crowds.

Entry.JapaneseText: もともとの姿を保ったバイラス。 フォルスの影響をあまり受けていないため、 急激なフォルスの影響に弱い。
Entry.EnglishText: Birus that have retained their original form. Less affected by Force and thus weak to rapid Force effects.

Entry.JapaneseText: もともとが植物なため、あまり移動はしないが 体を伸び縮みさせる事ができるので 広い攻撃範囲を持っている。
Entry.EnglishText: Since they were originally plants, they don't move much, but they have a wide attack range because they can extend and contract their bodies.

Entry.JapaneseText: 動物がバイラスになる事で凶暴化したもの。 なりふりかまわず攻撃してくるが 振りが大きいため、スキがある。
Entry.EnglishText: They're animals that became violent Birus. They attack regardless of appearance,
Entry.Notes: Beasts type description I don't really know how to translate 振りが大きいため、スキがある here -Kaizen

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度死んでいるためか痛みをあまり感じず のけぞりにくいためしつこく攻撃してくる。 また、ＨＰも非常に高い。
Entry.EnglishText: They attack persistently as they don't feel much pain and are difficult to roll over, probably because they have died once. They also have a very high HP.

Entry.JapaneseText: 実体がないため、直接攻撃ではあまり ダメージを与える事ができない。 術攻撃が効果的。
Entry.EnglishText: Due to the lack of a physical body, direct attacks can't do much damage to them. Artes are effective in this case.

Entry.JapaneseText: 岩石や鉱物がバイラス化したもの。 硬い身体を使った攻撃を行ってくる。 攻撃力や防御力が高い。
Entry.EnglishText: Birus that originated from rocks and minerals. They attack using their hard bodies. High attack and defence power.

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラス化によって、原型を留めないほど 異形化してしまったもの。 多様な攻撃方法を持つ。
Entry.EnglishText: Birus that became so deformed after becoming one that they are no longer in their original form. They have a diversity of attacks.

Entry.JapaneseText: 世界を形作る六元素を司る聖なる守護者。 フォルスと同質の驚異的な力を持っており、 その戦闘能力は高い。人智を越えた存在。
Entry.EnglishText: Sacred guardian of the six sacred beasts that shape the world. They posses astonishing power of the same nature as Force, and their fighting abilities are high. Existences beyond human knowledge.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>の負の思念から生み出された 異形の存在。
Entry.EnglishText: Grotesque beings created from the negative thoughts of <Yellow>people<White>.
